continue_with_google: 使用 Google 帐号登录
continue_with_github: 使用 Github 账号登录
login_requried_before_uploading: 您需要先登录才能上传
upload_prompt: 点击此处或拖放文件到这里
error_login_required: 您需要先登录才能上传
error_email_unverified: 您的电子邮件尚未验证通过
error_expire_too_large: 自动删除时间超过允许的最大值
error_image_processing: 您上传的文件格式不正确
error_storage: An unknown error occurred while saving your image
error_unsupported_format: Your selected image format is not supported
password_prompt: Password must be between 8 to 30 characters in length.
username_prompt: Username must be 3-30 characters long and can include letters, numbers, underscores (_), hashtags (#), and spaces
email_prompt: Enter a valid email address with a format like 'example@example.com', using letters, numbers, periods (.), and hyphens (-).
password_must_be_set: You must set a password before managing your social accounts.
click_to_send_verification_email: Click here to send a verification email.
oauth_dup_email: An account with this email (%s) is already created. Please sign in to your original account.
no_permission_to_delete: You do not have permission to delete this image
password_wrong_length: Password must be between 8 to 30 characters in length.
invalid_username: Invalid username. Username must be 3-30 characters long and can include letters, numbers, underscores (_), hashtags (#), and spaces.
dup_username: This username is already used by another user.
dup_email: This email address is already used by another user.
change_email_verification_email_sent: An verification email has been sent to your new email address
reset_password_email_sent: An email has been sent to you. Please follow instructions in the email to reset your password.
no_password_set: You have not set a password yet.
recaptcha_site_key_desc: The site key for Google's reCAPTCHA service.
recaptcha_secret_key_desc: The secret key for Google's reCAPTCHA service.
site_url_desc: Public URL for your site, excluding the trailing slash(/)
restart_take_effect: Restart the server for this setting to take effect.
max_image_size_desc: The maximum size for uploaded images in bytes
max_guest_duration_desc: The duration in seconds that images uploaded by guests will be retained before automatic deletion. Enter '0' to disable this limit.
max_user_duration_desc: The duration in seconds that images uploaded by registered users will be retained before automatic deletion. Enter '0' to disable this limit.
allow_avif_encoding_desc: Encoding AVIF images may take a large amount of system resources (CPU & memory).
name: Name
s3_public_url_desc: The public accessable URL prefix for your s3 bucket.
restart_for_settings_to_apply: Restart the server for settings on this page to take effect.
no_storage_driver_found: No storage drivers available. Create a new one using the form below.
